doc.name: motionRelease
doc.summary: Sent when a motion is ended due to an incoming even such as a phone-call.

example.p: stopDice -- stops the animation when the motion is stopped

description.overview: Handle the motionRelease message to perform an action when a motion is stopped due to an incoming event such as a phone-call.

parameters.parameter: The motion is the type of motion detected by the device

description.comments:
The motionRelease message is sent to the current card of the defaultStack when a motion is ended due to an incoming event such as a phone-call.
As of iPhoneOS 3.0 the only motion that is generated is "shake"
